abstract: The price for new and popular e-books appears to be settling at $9.99, making traditional publishers nervous.
snippet: The price for new and popular e-books appears to be settling at $9.99, making traditional publishers nervous.
lead_paragraph: Adding to mounting tensions in the publishing industry over the pricing of electronic books, Sony Electronics announced Tuesday evening that it was lowering prices for new and best-selling books in its e-book store, to $9.99 from $11.99.

headline.main: Sony to Cut E-Book Prices and Offer New Readers
headline.print_headline: Sony to Cut E-Book Prices And Offer New Readers

byline.original: By Brad Stone and Motoko Rich
